name: Flux Family Secrets: The Ripple Effect
name_original: Flux Family Secrets: The Ripple Effect
description:
Flux Family Secrets: The Ripple Effect is a game developed by Skunk Studios. It came out on 11-04-2009. Big Fish Games published the game.
You can play Flux Family Secrets: The Ripple Effect on PC.
It was scored by Karney Music and Sound.
